SelectTop10RecordsOfPatientsOrderByDesc: SELECT TOP 10 Id,FirstName,LastName,Gender,DOB,EmailAddress,PrimaryContactNumber FROM Patients WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1 DESC;
SelectTop10RecordsOfConsultationPayments: SELECT TOP 10 Id,ConsultationId,MerchantOrderNumber,PaymentAmount,TransactionId,CSVResponseCode FROM Payments WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1 DESC;
SelectTop10RecordsOfConfigurationIntakeQ: SELECT TOP 10 Id,InstanceId,ProductType,Title,Description,WeightageTitle,CreatedOn FROM dbo.IntakeQuestionnaire WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1 DESC;
SelectTop10RecordsOfProviderLicensesOrde: SELECT TOP 10 Id,ProviderId,StateCode,LicenseNumber,LicenseStatus,ExpirationDate,StatusCode FROM dbo.Licenses WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1 DESC;
